# Global Rules
Permission: limited
Purpose: training-allowed-with-attribution
Contact: hello@altiv.ai

# Allowed Sections
Allow: /blog/
Allow: /about/
Allow: /public-resources/
Allow: /careers/

# Restricted Areas
Disallow: /api/
Disallow: /assessment/
Disallow: /results/
Disallow: /user/
Disallow: /dashboard/

# Data Usage Terms
Usage-Policy: https://altiv.ai/ai-training-policy
Attribution-Required: true
Commercial-Use: restricted

# Training Guidelines
Training-Allowed: partial
Training-Restrictions: no-personal-data, no-assessment-content
Training-Attribution: required

# Content Freshness
Cache-Control: max-age=86400
Last-Modified: [04/06/2025]

# Additional Rules

Data-Retention: 365-days
